medical_history.chief_complaint: Carlos presented with the belief that 'lines' were coming out of his mouth and genitals, and he spent several hours a day organizing objects in his house.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately two years prior, starting with feelings of loneliness and depression, progressing to intrusive thoughts about objects being aligned. Symptoms worsened over the last month, leading to increased social isolation and conflicts at work.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Carlos had a diagnosis of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) and no history of substance use or significant medical problems.
medical_history.family_history: Notable for a maternal aunt with OCD and a paternal uncle with schizophrenia.
medical_history.social_history: Carlos experienced increased social isolation and poor performance at school, withdrew from family interactions, and had conflicts with coworkers at his part-time job.
